profileText: a Representative from New York; born in Washington, D.C., February 26, 1976; graduated from Sidwell Friends School, Washington, D.C., 1994; B.A., Yale University, New Haven, Conn., 1998; J.D., Stanford University, Stanford, Calif., 2005; journalist; legal analyst; law clerk, United States District Court, Northern District of California; law clerk, United States Court of Appeals, Second Circuit; assistant United States attorney for the Southern District of New York, 2007-2017; staff, United States Representative Adam Schiff of California, 2019; staff, United States House of Representatives Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence, 2019-2020; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress (January 3, 2023-present).
